#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{int t,s,n,k,n2;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {s=0;
              scanf("%d",&n);
              n2=n;
              while(n)
              {
                      s+=n%10;
                      n/=10;
                      }
                      k=1<<s;
                      k*=n2;
                      printf("%d \n",k);
                      }
                      return 0;
                      }
